primevc.gui.layout.RelativeLayout

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
primevc.core.geom.IBox
The relative layout class describes the wanted settings of a layout client in relation with the layout-parent. In a relative layout it's possible to set the prop horizontalCenter = 0 to make sure the layout is always centered in relation with it's layout parent. The parent can choose to apply or ignore the relative properties depending on the layout-algorithm that is uses. When the algorithm is positionating every layout-child next to eachother, the horizontalCenter will be ignored for example. This class is not meant for standalone use but should always be placed in the LayoutClient.relative property.

Constructor

new(?top : Int, ?right : Int, ?bottom : Int, ?left : Int, ?hCenter : Int, ?vCenter : Int)

Instance Variables

bottom(getBottom,setBottom) : Int

Property defines the relative bottom position in relation with the parent.

change(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal0

Signal to notify listeners that a property of the relative layout is changed.

enabled : Bool

Flag indicating if the relative-properties are enabled or disabled. When the value is false, it will still be possible to change the values but there won't be fired a change signal to let the layout- client now that it's changed.

hCenter(default,setHCenter) : Int

Defines at what horizontal-location the center of the layoutclient should be placed in the center of the parent-layout.

left(getLeft,setLeft) : Int

Property defines the relative left position in relation with the parent.

right(getRight,setRight) : Int

Property defines the relative right position in relation with the parent.

top(getTop,setTop) : Int

Property defines the relative top position in relation with the parent.

vCenter(default,setVCenter) : Int

Defines at what vertical-location the center of the layoutclient should be placed in the center of the parent-layout.

Instance Methods

inline clone() : primevc.core.geom.IBox

dispose() : Void
